summary: This document is a summary of account activity for a Deutsche Bank account associated with the Butterfly Trust for the period from September 1, 2015, to September 30, 2015. It details account balances, transactions, and service charges, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $23,625.44.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for September 2015
events.description: The account summary details the balance and transactions for the Butterfly Trust account, including an outgoing transfer.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $423,625.44 on September 1, 2015.
An outgoing transfer of $23,625.44 was made on September 24, 2015.
The ending balance as of September 30, 2015, was $2.97.
Service charges for the statement period included a total of $50.00.
Interest earned during the period was $2.97.
